description:
Senpai isn’t sure he can beat the art club president in popularity at the culture festival. Nagatoro and the gang do everything they can to help him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Has Spring Come Even for You, the Unpopular Loner Louse Senpai? / Did You Hear Her Talk About Love, Senpai?
Himote wa Gufu na Senpai ni mo Tsui ni Haru ga Touraissukaa? / Ai Toka Iwarecchattemasu yo Senpai?
非モテはぐフナセンパイにもついに春が到来っスか~? / 愛とか言われちゃってますよぉセンパーイ?
